description: Two storey side and rear extension, ground floor front lobby extension and ground floor side extension
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, in accordance with UDP Policies B1, B5, H8, H9 and deposit UDP Policies 4.1, 5.5 and 5.9.  REASON:	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings. | The garage accommodation shall not be used for living purposes.  REASON:	To ensure that adequate parking accommodation is retained within the site, in accordance with Policy Table 20B and deposit Policy 9.1 and Appendix 1 (Chapter 9). | The proposed first floor side window shall be in obscure glazing and unopenable except for the top hung top light.  REASON:  To protect the privacy of residents at No. 8 Birkdale Road.
